bill.title: Recognizing the challenges, achievements, and significant contributions of women and minorities in the fields of housing, housing finance, and community development.
bill.description: This resolution (1) recognizes the significant contributions and importance of representation of women and minorities in housing; (2) encourages increased participation of these individuals in housing and related fields; and (3) considers promoting diversity, policies, and robust investment in certain programs that assist women and minorities.

committee.name: Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

history.action: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H4075)
